posts.post_title: FS  SOLD 1930's  Lou Gehrig Post Card  SGC 1.5
posts.post_content: Selling  1930's Real Photo Post Card   Lou Gehrig  SGC 1.5 (grade is due to residue on back--This is same photo you see on the 1933 Worch Cigar Company, but much more scarce  $4500---Paypal or Check---I would take some trade if interested.   thanks,  Don
